option.od: print the help message and exit.
filenames of the raw format files.
files are in the rawacf format.
filename of the rawacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in raw or rawacf format files.

description.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in raw or rawacf format files.
The total number of program identifiers followed by a list of the identifier numbers is written to standard output.

example.description: Find the program identifier numbers in the raw file "20030408.gbr.raw".
